content: dodecahedron thingymabob1 pattern written by amy thornton hook size c d or e yarn sock yarn 1 super fine yardage needed 150 yards time to complete about 5 hours notes 1 each point of the dodecahedron is worked in a spiral at the beginning of the first round place a stitch marker in the first stitch to keep track of where the round began move the stitch marker to the first stitch of each round as each round is worked 2 each point is worked from the tip to the base then connected to the dodecahedron body the first thirteen steps of each point are identical the final step is unique to the point being worked 3 the points can be assembled as you go or after you make all points if you choose to assemble after you make all points leave a 24 tail of yarn for assembly before cutting yarn to begin the next point dodecahedron points 1 ch2 4sc in second chain from hook 4 sts do not join 2 2sc in each single_crochet around 8 sts 3 2sc in next single_crochet 7 times single_crochet in last single_crochet 15 sts 4 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 15 sts 5 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 15 sts 6 2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 scs around 20 sts 7 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 20 sts 8 2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 scs around 25 sts 9 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 25 sts 10 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 25 sts 11 2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in each of next 3 scs 2sc in next single_crochet 2sc in next single_crochet 4 times single_crochet in each of next 3 scs 2sc in last single_crochet 35 sts 12 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 35 sts 13 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 35 sts assemble using assembly directions below for the point worked or cut yarn leaving a 24 tail if you are making all 12 points before assembling 1 this pattern is an extensive revision of the celestine crochet pattern published by the berroco design team berroco s celestine crochet pattern can be found at http //www berroco com/exclusives/celestine_crochet/celestine_crochet html assembly 1st point- slip_stitch in first single_crochet of round 13 fasten_off and place a stitch marker at the tip of this point to mark it as the 1st point 2nd point- with right sides facing each other and working through the stitches on round 13 of both the 1st and 2nd point slip_stitch the first seven stitches of round 13 on the 2nd point to the first seven stitches on the 1st point fasten_off and place a marker different color or different type than 1st point marker on the top of this point to mark it as the 2nd point 3rd point- with right sides facing slip_stitch the first seven stitches of round 13 on the current point to the last seven stitches on the 1st point do not fasten_off continue to slip_stitch
